tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE Quizzes (
  quiz_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  question TEXT,
  correct_answer TEXT,
  user_answer TEXT,
  grade DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE Quizzes (
    quiz_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    question TEXT,
    correct_answer TEXT,
    student_answer TEXT,
    grade DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE Grades (
    grade_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    student_id INT,
    quiz_id INT,
    achieved_grade DECIMAL,
    FOREIGN KEY (student_id) REFERENCES Students(student_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (quiz_id) REFERENCES Quizzes(quiz_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Answers (
  answer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  quiz_id INT,
  student_id INT,
  chosen_answer TEXT,
  marks INT
);
